Beth Salvatore

Developer, musician, knitter.

I am a web developer based outside of Minneapolis. As a lifelong creative-type, I find that creating something amazing, from code, is the ultimate rush. If I wasn't a developer, I think I would be a detective because, next to creating, I love to research and troubleshoot problems.
